definition: crying tears of joy (idiom)
to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
extremely/pole (geography, physics)/utmost/top
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
to sob

sentences.english: His father and brother wept with joy as he emerged, Anatolia reported.
sentences.chinese: 當他被救出時，他的父親和哥哥喜極而泣。

sentences.english: She was so happy that she shed tears of delight.
sentences.chinese: 她因爲太幸福了，所以喜極而泣。

definition: to turn tears into laughter (idiom); to turn grief into happiness
smile spread across the face (idiom); beaming with pleasure/all smiles/joy written across one's face
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
as if relieved from a burden (idiom)/to have a weight off one's mind
grinning from ear to ear (idiom)/beaming with happiness
to yell/hubbub
to wail at a funeral/formal wailing while offering sacrifice to the departed
to turn pale with fright (idiom)
precious darling (often refers to one's child)/sweetheart
the second person/(fig.) someone else/third party
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
sullen/to scowl miserably
hanging one's head dispiritedly (idiom); dejected/crestfallen
cheering excitedly (idiom)/jubilant
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
to pull a face/to grimace/to scowl
